name: Cirrus (organicbran)
description:
Leap from platform to platform, build your ship, and defend your vessel against enemies high above the clouds. Controls
  • Move: A + D / Left Stick
  • Jump: Space / A
  • Dash: Shift / X
  • Fire: Left Click (hold) / RT (hold)
  • Toggle Build Mode: B / Y
  • Move Piece: Mouse / Left Stick
  • Place Piece: Left Click / A
  • Switch Pieces: A + D / LB + RB
  • Rotate Piece: R / X
